tool_description: Piexel level background remove for object or human
name: Background Remove API
title: Background Remove API

api_list.name: segmentation
api_list.description: This API allows users to upload an image and remove its background. Users can also choose to fill the removed background area with a specified color.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://background-remove-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/segmentation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "background-remove-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
